name: transfer-credit-articulation
description: Students walk through articulating a community college course not listed on ASSIST.

events.content: Taking CS 221 at Foothill this summer, but it's not on ASSIST. How do I know if it transfers?
Email articulations@calpoly.edu with the syllabus and course outline. They’ll tell you if it maps to CSC 202 or becomes support credit.
Also ask Foothill for a course description PDF, not just the catalog blurb. Articulation needs topic-level detail.
